member.name: T:NUnitExtension.DataDriven.DataSourceAttribute
member.summary: TestFactoryAttribute is used to mark the method as an data source.

member.name: T:NUnitExtension.DataDriven.TestCaseItem
member.summary: The TestCaseItem class represents a set of arguments and a set of constraints info to be used for a parameterized test case.

member.name: T:NUnitExtension.DataDriven.DataFactoryAttribute
member.summary: DataFactoryAttribute indicates the source to be used to provide test cases for a test method.
